Package dr.evomodel.branchratemodel

Interface Summary
BranchRateModel Date: Dec 13, 2004 Time: 1:59:24 PM
 

Class Summary
AbstractBranchRateModel An abstract base class for BranchRateModels to help implement some of the interfaces
ArbitraryBranchRates Allows branch rates to take on any double value This is useful for forming a scaled mixture of normals for the continuous diffusion model
AttributeBranchRateModel  
CompoundBranchRateModel Takes a collection of BranchRateModels and returns the product of the respective rates.
ContinuousBranchRates Uses the implementation of continuous branch rates described in: Li, W.L.S.
ContinuousEpochBranchRateModel  
ContinuousTraitBranchRateModel Takes the log rates at each node provided by a specified rate and give the branch rate as the average.
DecayingRateModel  
DefaultBranchRateModel  
DiscreteTraitBranchRateModel This Branch Rate Model takes a ancestral state likelihood and gives the rate for each branch of the tree based on the ancestor state and child state or based on the Markov Rewards (i.e., time spent in each state).
DiscretizedBranchRates  
LocalClockModel  
MixtureModelBranchRates  
PassageBranchRateModel  
RandomLocalClockModel A model of rates evolving along a tree, such that at each node the rate may change or not depending on an indicator which chooses whether the parent rate is inherited or a new rate begins on the branch above the node.
RateEpochBranchRateModel Implements a model where time is broken into 'epochs' each with a different but constant rate.
ScaledTreeLengthRateModel Package: ScaledTreeLengthRateModel Description:

Created by Alexander V.
StrictClockBranchRates  
TipBranchRateModel  
 

Enum Summary
DiscreteTraitBranchRateModel.Mode  
LocalClockModel.ClockType
